rice.name: Rice
tips: Maintain standing water (2-5 cm) during early growth stages.
Apply nitrogen fertilizer in splits.
Monitor for pests like Stem Borer.

maize.name: Maize
tips: Ensure good drainage; maize is sensitive to water logging.
Control weeds specifically during the first 4 weeks.
Apply Zinc Sulphate if leaves show white streaks.

chickpea.name: Chickpea
tips: Avoid sowing in highly alkaline soils.
Seed treatment with Rhizobium is recommended.
Nipping encourages branching.

kidneybeans.name: Kidney Beans
tips: Requires well-distributed rainfall.
Susceptible to frost and water logging.
Inoculate seeds with Rhizobium phaseoli.

pigeonpeas.name: Pigeon Peas
tips: Deep rooted crop, drought tolerant.
Avoid water logging conditions.
Intercropping with maize or sorghum is common.

mothbeans.name: Moth Beans
tips: Highly drought resistant.
Excellent for soil erosion control.
Can be grown as a fodder crop.

mungbean.name: Mung Bean
tips: Short duration crop (60-70 days).
Yellow Mosaic Virus is a common threat.
Ensure moisture at pod filling stage.

blackgram.name: Black Gram
tips: Sensitive to saline and alkaline soils.
Use phosphatic fertilizers for better root development.
Harvest when 80% of pods turn black.

lentil.name: Lentil
tips: Cool climate crop.
Requires fine seedbed preparation.
Aphids can be a major pest.

pomegranate.name: Pomegranate
tips: Pruning is essential for shape and fruit quality.
Bacterial Blight is a major disease.
Fruit cracking can occur due to irregular watering.

banana.name: Banana
tips: Requires high nitrogen and potassium.
Propping is needed for fruit bunches.
Desuckering should be done regularly.

mango.name: Mango
tips: Alternate bearing is a common issue.
Protect from frost during early years.
Mango hopper is a serious pest.

grapes.name: Grapes
tips: Training and pruning are critical.
Powdery mildew is a common disease.
Avoid rain during ripening.

watermelon.name: Watermelon
tips: Requires warm, dry weather for ripening.
Mulching helps in moisture conservation.
Fruit fly management is important.

muskmelon.name: Muskmelon
tips: Sensitive to water logging.
Rotate crops to avoid soil-borne diseases.
Harvest when 'full slip' stage is reached.

apple.name: Apple
tips: Requires chilling hours for flowering.
Cross-pollination is often necessary.
Scab is a major disease; monitor regularly.

orange.name: Orange
tips: Avoid water stagnation.
Micro-nutrient deficiency (Zn, Fe) is common.
Prune dry and diseased branches.

papaya.name: Papaya
tips: Highly sensitive to frost and water logging.
Papaya Ring Spot Virus is a major threat.
Harvest when fruit shows color break.

coconut.name: Coconut
tips: Requires high humidity.
Rhinoceros beetle is a common pest.
Apply salt along with fertilizers for better yield.

cotton.name: Cotton
tips: Deep ploughing helps control soil-borne pests.
Topping checks excessive growth.
Pink Bollworm management is critical.

jute.name: Jute
tips: Requires water for retting procedure.
Weeding is crucial in early stages.
Harvest at small pod stage for best fiber quality.

coffee.name: Coffee
tips: Requires shade trees.
Pruning is necessary to maintain bush shape.
Berry Borer is a major pest.
